item.title: Docker: Using docker with LVM Thin Pool
item.description: Docker is the nice tool for almost every use case in my sphere. It’s easy to use, it’s fast to build and deploy. Docker can be used with miscellaneous storage drivers such as btrfs, datamapper, overlayfs, aufs. A long time I was using docker with btrfs backend and everything seems to be nice, but when load on this server increased, corrupted layers are began to appear. It looks like build process in the next RUN step unable to find files from previous step.
